data.title: Nowgong College
data.text:
Welcome to Nowgong College

Nowgong College (Autonomous), established on 7th August, 1944, is one of the pioneer colleges of Assam. Established with the permission from the University of Calcutta, the college has been playing a pivotal role in imparting quality education since its inception. The college is located at the heart of Nagaon district. It imparts Under graduate and Post Graduate level of education with about 90 faculty members, and offers major courses in all subjects in Arts, Commerce and Science stream. Thanks to the arduous efforts of its founder like Jananeta Moti Ram Bora, Principal Sahityacharyya Jajneswar Sharma, some distinguished personalities, administrators, teachers and students, the college has produced many extra-ordinary talents and made a distinguished position in the academic, social and intellectual realm of the state.

Read More

Why Nowgong College ?

Choosing a college is one of the most important decisions you will have to make, and it is one that will affect you for the rest of your life.

Nowgong College (Autonomous) provides your academic and social base for your time here. Although all Colleges work on the same lines, they vary in age and traditions, in size, subjects offered, situation and general atmosphere.

You will need to take all these into account as we try to help you by giving you a flavor of life in Nowgong College (Autonomous) in the pages of this prospectus.

The College is right in the heart of Nagaon town and this creates an informal, close, friendly and supportive environment that encourages hard work and academic achievement.

It has highly experienced, talented and professionally excellent as well as young and energetic faculties.

It is a Wi-Fi enabled campus with state-of-the-art classrooms equipped with modem teaching-learning aids to facilitate technology-enabled learning.

It offers ICT facilities to the students â€“ Computers with internet facility, Digital class rooms, and Digital library, a central library with about 50,000 books, journals and periodicals.

It organizes extensive personality-improvement programs and ensures placement of the students through the Placement Cell of the college It tries to monitor the activities of students inside the college premises through closed-circuit cameras.
